title: The Young Savages (1961, USA) Burt Lancaster, Dina Merrill, Shelley Winters, Telly Savalas, Edward Andrews

sources.title: The Young Savages (1961, USA) Burt Lancaster, Dina Merrill, Shelley Winters, Telly Savalas, Edward Andrews
sources.description: The Young Savages is a 1961 American crime drama film directed by John Frankenheimer and starring Burt Lancaster. It was written by Edward Anhalt from a novel by Evan Hunter.The supporting cast includes Dina Merrill, Shelley Winters, and Edward Andrews.The Young Savages was the first film featuring Telly Savalas, who plays a police detective, foreshadowing his later role as Kojak. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Young_Savages Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free.
